channel.title: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view
channel.description:
First of all thank you for reading.
EDIT: I Would also be Motivated as an admin on a good rsps. i only bring good to the server, i have many suggestions and ideas to help also. im on 14 hours a day, and mostly at nights i am a very avid honest, trusworthy, friendly player :) If you could try me out, id show you :) Let me know thanks.
Hi there my name is justin, my gaming name is maz & i am 19 years old.
I have made several servers for a game called wolfenstein. MCF,*vsay, Trickjump I have handed them all to my co owners wich still owns the servers and are some of the best today.
I Figured out that an RSPS is way diffrent and harder to do, thats o.k i like the challenge.
Im looking for a partner to help me With RSPS. or possibly i could help you.
*my benefits* I have 3 computers incase we get a lot of players, we could make a brother and sister rsps. including your computer thats 4 or more. I am very motivated to do this. I played runescape 8 years, and know all the is to know about it. i no longer play, since rs sucks now.. hence why i am here at RSPS's! . i have paypal, and i am willing to put thousands into this, to make the most successfull server. also i play average 14 hours a day.
i need a partner who could help me out and know his shit. if this is you let me know send me a message il reply and add you to my facebook or you add me.
. Thanks!
I AM LOOKING TO START ASAP! im anxiously waiting for someone to reply.

item.title: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Join a development team. I don’t think this thread should stay opened.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view

item.title: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view
item.dc:creator: @mazera mazera
item.description:
@mazera wrote:

honestly i just want to be apart of a good server, but none seem to stay online, wich i why i tought i could make one. i spent a week on it and still cant get it to go, i had troubles with my ipconfig ect… anyways

yes i guess i would like to join a team that would be good aswell… i just want to help a server that wont die u know? lol cause otherwise its time wasted. :S help me out? lol

Read full topic
item.source: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view

item.title: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

It seems to me that you are trying to join a development team, not create one. Is that correct?

Read full topic
item.source: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view

item.title: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view
item.dc:creator: @mazera mazera
item.description:
@mazera wrote:

well thats good. i would love that… if they arent strict how would they keep the server up. i mean if people wont do thier jobs u gotta be strict right? i get it dont worry, but i can still have a blast doing it.

i recently was on flailscape, but the server crashed… and i was almost an admin i could say by earning it just playing being nice, helping everyone qith every question. but it crashed and i lost faith in it so im looking for a good onr that will remain up for along time and im willing to donate for it

can i get more info on the angels? plz? lost angels

Read full topic
item.source: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view

item.title: Looking For a Partner To create The ultimate RSPS! Please view
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

mazera:

Thanks… lol i am very motivated i just seen lost angels, i would be great server admin. i aint money hungry ingame, i just like fun

Lost-Angels isn’t a place to have fun to be honest. In fact the staff team is a strict team, at least that doesn’t allow immaturity.

Read full topic
